definition: cooking method/to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)

sentences.english: Food with a lot of fat should be watched carefully - cooking to for too long can lead to burning.
sentences.chinese: 不宜長時間烹煮油脂重的食物，以免油脂過熱發煙。

sentences.english: Ensure food is properly cooked and still hot when served.
sentences.chinese: 確保食物經過適當烹煮並趁熱食用。

sentences.english: The tortoise shells surrounded the remains of individuals who the scientists say were shamans. And there’s evidence that the animals were cooked and eaten.
sentences.chinese: 科學家在這些動物殘骸上發現明顯被烹煮過的痕跡。

sentences.english: Separate cutting boards must be used for raw and ready-to-eat foods.
sentences.chinese: 未經烹煮的食品和現成食品應該各有不同的砧板。
愛莉絲則幫忙媽媽烹煮。

sentences.english: In the hot kitchen quantities have been set at 100 persons (max).
sentences.chinese: 在熱食方面，規定的烹煮數量爲最多一百人份。

sentences.english: Deer meat is eaten either frozen or slightly boiled.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常生喫鹿肉，或者將其稍加烹煮後進食。

sentences.english: Tea is usually boiled on a separate small stove in the room or directly outside, away from the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 烹茶須用小爐，烹煮的地點須遠離廚房，而近飲處。

sentences.english: Some livers, when cooked, retain their fat and thus their rich flavour.
sentences.chinese: 有些鵝肝烹煮後很好的保留了油脂，香味濃腴誘人。

sentences.english: Place tapioca in a pan with the beet juice.
sentences.chinese: 將西谷米和甜菜汁放入鍋中烹煮。

sentences.english: Alfonso always takes the skin off chicken before he cooks it.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾方索在烹煮雞肉前都先去皮。

sentences.english: Many of today's famous chefs don't simply cook exquisite food.
sentences.chinese: 很多今天的著名大廚師，不僅僅能烹煮精緻的菜餚。

sentences.english: Proper cooking inactivates the virus present inside the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 適當烹煮可滅活在蛋的內部存在的病毒。

sentences.english: Ground-nuts, not roasted or otherwise cooked, whether or not shelled or broken.
sentences.chinese: 未焙炒或未烹煮的花生，不論是否去殼或破碎。

sentences.english: Acar also can use to make Acar Fish or Meat with tastes of sour and spicy.
sentences.chinese: 阿查也能夠用在烹煮酸辣阿查魚的食譜內。

definition: to scorch/(of the sun) to beat down on
cooking method/to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)
